participant_1.background:
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
I am pretty close with my family.
I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work.
i speak fluent italian.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to music on Spotify, and I watch YouTube videos to help me pass my classes.
my favorite music is jim hendrix.
i often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
I am an entrepreneur who is passionate about using social media to grow my business.
i have long flowing hair.

content.text: I'm well, thank you! What are your interests?
I enjoy music, activism, and entrepreneurship.
What kind of music do you like?
I love classic rock, and Jim Hendrix is my favorite artist.
I love classic rock too! I used to sing in a choir when I was younger.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at singing, but I love listening to music.
I have asthma, so I can't sing in a choir anymore, but I still enjoy it.
That's too bad, but I'm glad you still enjoy it!
Thanks. What kind of activism do you do?
I mostly focus on environmental issues and social justice.
That's great! I'm passionate about environmental issues too.
Me too! I think it's important to do what we can to protect our planet.
I agree! Do you have any kids?
Not yet, but I'm hoping to have one or two in the future.
That's exciting! I'm sure you'll be a great parent.
